data.title: [RESULTS] Letterboxd's Top 50 Gangster Films!
data.meta_description: A list of 50 films compiled on Letterboxd, including The Godfather (1972), GoodFellas (1990), The Departed (2006), The Godfather Part II (1974) and Pulp Fiction (1994). About this list: Ties are ranked in alphabetical order #1. The Godfather (1972) dir. by Francis Ford Coppola || IMDb: 9.2/10 || Points: 228 #2. Goodfellas (1990) dir. by Martin Scorsese || IMDb: 8.8/10 || Points: 177 #3. The Departed (2005) dir. by Martin Scorsese || IMDb: 8.5/10 || Points: 142 - TIE #4.
